sys_metadata_link.payload:
7faf0f032ff31890e0f497eef699b607 30 Smugglers learn early on to be self-reliant and sure of themselves.  It isn't enough to hope things will work out or believe in some hokey religion - they have to take luck into their own hands if they want to keep flying, much less make a credit or two.

BASE ABILITY

Once per game session, as an incidental, the character may spend 2 destiny points to change the face of one positive die in the character's dice pool to another face adjacent to it.  An "adjacent" face is any die face sharing an edge - not a point - with the rolled face.  Unmatched Fortune cannot be used on a force die.

]]> Unmatched Fortune SIG0001019 ben.fisher 2022-07-11 18:15:16 b104a3b22fe49950e0f497eef699b6b9 0 ben.fisher 2022-07-11 18:15:16 {"gunslinger":"90dcc3ba2f249950e0f497eef699b652,e8fc07ba2f249950e0f497eef699b640","pilot":"6d1ff13b2fc8a050e0f497eef699b6f4,7d6fb1f72fc8a050e0f497eef699b62b","scoundrel":"6b94c67f2fc8a050e0f497eef699b6a1,2525c67f2fc8a050e0f497eef699b6ab","thief":"032eca3b2f0ca050e0f497eef699b673,a5aeca3b2f0ca050e0f497eef699b677"}
